lexUnit.name: nose.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the part projecting above the mouth on a person or animal, containing the nostrils and used in breathing and smelling

sentence.text: It was only a matter of moments before one man twitched his nose at some unfamiliar scent , and turned to see what it was .
